sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_ci_analytics_event</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Validate Custom Events Count</name> <order>110</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { var type = current.type; var MAX_CUSTOM_EVENTS_MESSAGE = gs.getMessage('Custom events cannot be more than 20'); if (type == 'Custom') { var count = new GlideAggregate('sn_ci_analytics_event'); count.addQuery('type', '=','Custom'); count.addAggregate('COUNT'); count.query(); var customEvents = 0; if (count.next()) customEvents = count.getAggregate('COUNT'); if (customEvents == 20) { gs.addInfoMessage(MAX_CUSTOM_EVENTS_MESSAGE); current.setAbortAction(true); } } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-06 09:13:19</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>250456b7536310101dccddeeff7b12f9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Validate Custom Events Count</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">c53ca02a73c310108564b17afef6a7c0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">c53ca02a73c310108564b17afef6a7c0</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_250456b7536310101dccddeeff7b12f9</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-06 09:19:40</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=250456b7536310101dccddeeff7b12f9"/> </record_update>
